name: perfectlyrandom.org
body:
### Welcome to perfectlyrandom.org!

## About Me

_I am an engineer with a PhD in Chemical Engineering. But I work with mathematics and computers. I live in San Francisco._

_On this website, I aim to add interesting content that you cannot find otherwise on the internet. In other words, every time I have to figure out something new that wasnâ€™t previously there on the internet, I put the information up here._

_You can expect to find computer-y things here. Mathematical and logical things will also find their way on this site._

-Ankur
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
